item.description:
We're going to have a happy hour together in downtown Hartford and have some drinks. The location is Salute, click the link below to check it out:

http://www.salutect.c...

We'll arrive at 6pm and mingle for a while. After a bit we'll visit some other nearby nice venues like Max's, Trumbull Kitchen, or Cuvee.


Hartford Young Professionals and Entrepreneurs (HYPE) is having a get together at Salute also that night so we'll be mingling with some of them to. If you have a business card go ahead and bring it, it'll be a good opportunity to network for you.

Dress nicely and let's have a nice evening.
item.name: Happy Hour at Salute
